verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Moyo wa jiwe-
nini kama nisipo
lainisha moyo. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Moyo wangu mgumu
tena mgumu kama jiwe
na kumwagiamaji juu
ya jiwe kazi bure.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nisipolitangaza pendo
la Mungu kwa matendo
kamwe sitazionja
baraka na rehema zake.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Na nisipoikiri kanuni ile
ya imani hata nikeshi
vipi kwa maombi
ni kazi bure.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ni heri ni kubali kikao
cha upatanishi nimkane
shetani na nguzo
zake nizivunje.
